81-916.Property and assets relating to surplus and excess property programs; transferred to Department of Correctional Services; when.

Effective July 1, 1982, all property, assets, and liabilities relating to those federal surplus and excess property programs which are consolidated by Public Law 94-519 and operated by the Department of Transportation shall be transferred to the Department of Correctional Services.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 548, ยง 4;Laws 1981, LB 536, ยง 4;Laws 1982, LB 767, ยง 4;Laws 2017, LB339, ยง 283.
